sub_concepts.name: Magma
sub_concepts.definition: Molten rock beneath the Earth's surface

sub_concepts.name: Lava
sub_concepts.definition: Magma that reaches the Earth's surface

sub_concepts.name: Volcanic Eruptions
sub_concepts.definition: The release of magma, gases, and ash from a volcano

sub_concepts.name: Volcanic Vent
sub_concepts.definition: An opening in the Earth's crust through which volcanic materials are emitted
